2988:1265: ā jñāto bhagavantaḥ sarvatathā- ga[tā]ḥ svahṛdi candramaṇḍalākāraṁ paśyāmi|
2988:1270: yathākramācca- [ndra]maṇḍalaṁ sampūrṇaṁ bhavati tadvat prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṁ citta- ratnamapi paripūrṇaṁ bhavati|
2988:1271: yathā candramaṇḍalamāgantuka- kalābhiḥ sūryyamaṇḍa[la]raśamyapagamāt kramāt pūrṇaṁ dṛśyate tadvat prakṛtipariśuddhaṁ cittaratnamapi sarvakleśamalakalaṅkāpa- gamakramāt paripūrṇabuddhaguṇaṁ dṛśyate iti|
2988:1273: punarnavamapaṭale- svacchaṁ hi sarvasattvānāṁ cittaṁ śāntaṁ prabhāsvaram|
2988:1279: punaśca trayodaśe paṭale- maṇḍalaṁ sarvabuddhānāṁ tattvajñānācca maṇḍalam|
2988:1286: punastatraiva- sa caiva sarvabhāvena sarvadā samavasthitaḥ|
2988:1292: mahāsamayatantre'pi nirddiṣṭam- ahaṁ ca kāmarūpāgraḥ sarvabuddhairadhiṣṭhitaḥ|
2988:1299: tasya tattvam- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahārataḥ|
2988:1312: na bodhirnāpi buddhatvaṁ na sattvo nāpi jīvitā|
2988:1314: śrīvajramaṇḍalālaṅkāre nigaditam- sarvatra sarvadhātau tu sarvasattvā[śca] sarvataḥ|
2988:1324: sarvendriyaṁ ca vijñānaṁ cittaṁ sarvatra sarvataḥ||
2988:1333: tileṣu va yathā tailaṁ rasa ikṣoḥ prakalpitaḥ||
2988:1335: puṣpeṣu vā yathā gandho dadhni navanītaṁ yathā|
2988:1340: sambaratantre nigaditam- na yogaḥ pratibimbeṣu niṣiktādiṣu jāyate|
2988:1358: sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam|
2988:1370: punaḥ- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvaḥ paraṁ yataḥ|
2988:1392: na tasyopadravaṁ kiñcit sadā sarvatra vidyate||
2988:1398: rakṣā kṛtā tathā naiva yathaiva jñānabhāvinaḥ||
2988:1409: (58) jñātayaḥ sarvasattvā vai na paro'styatra ṣaḍgatau|
2988:1412: sthāne deśe gṛhe vā'tha pustake pratimāsu ca|
2988:1438: guruṇāpi hi dṛṣṭena guṇapūrṇā janā yadi|
2988:1444: (60) tato dināvadhiṁ kṛtvā śiṣyāya vacanaṁ vadet|
2988:1447: manasā bhavato vaśyaṁ kuru cittamato dṛḍham|
2988:1448: duṣpūraṇaṁ yato na syāttathā kāryyaṁ mahāmate||
2988:1500: puṇyahīnāḥ parāṁ bodhiṁ naiva prāpsyanti durnayāḥ|
2988:1501: itastataśca saṁsāre te bhramanti hi ṣaḍgatau||
2988:1506: na teṣāṁ sugatau janma buddhatvaṁ api durlabham|
2988:1513: saṁśayaṁ nahi dharmme tu karttavyamadhunā tvayā||
2988:1517: abhiṣekaṁ tvayā prāptaṁ vidyate na [hyataḥ] param||
2988:1519: sarvatāthāgatajñānavarābhiṣiktasya yoginaḥ māhātmyaṁ śrīsamāje nirddiṣṭam- tadyathā sarvatathāgatakāyavāk- cittavajraguhyasamabhiṣikto bhagavantaḥ ācāryyāḥ sarvatathā- gataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca kathaṁ draṣṭavyaḥ?
2988:1520: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- bodhicittaṁ vajraṁ iva kulaputrāḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyam|
2988:1522: bodhicittavajraścācāryyo dvayameva tadadhikāraṁ yāvat kulaputrāḥ saṁkṣepataḥ kathayāmi|
2988:1523: yāvanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bodhisattvāśca tiṣṭhanti prayanti ca sarve te trikāla- samayamāgatya tamācāryyaṁ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṁpūjya sarva- (63)
2988:1527: tadyathā- api nāma kulaputrā yāvanto buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu pracaranti teṣāṁ ca buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ yāvantaḥ kāyavākcittapuṇyaskandhā ācāryyasya romakūpāgravivare viśiṣyate|
2988:1529: bodhicittaṁ kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhajñānānāṁ sārabhūta- mutpattibhūtaṁ yāvat sarvajñajñānākaramiti|
2988:1532: mahājñānaprabhavitamahāyogīśvarasya prabhāvaṁ kalpakoṭi- śatenāpi sarvatathāgatairapi na śakyaṁ varṇayitum|
2988:1533: śrīsambaroktaṁ kiñcinmātraṁ kathyate- sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam|
2988:1557: ityāha bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ- sarvaśuddhyadhimokṣeṇa prasahya balavānadhaḥ|
2988:1598: avasāne tu karttavyaṁ sarvabuddhāḥ sa aurasāḥ|
2988:1619: yadi cittaṁ samaṁ yasya jñānaṁ tasyodayaṁ bhavet|
2988:1628: tattvaṁ vinā na buddhatvaṁ tattvaṁ mārgaṁ vinā na [ca]|
2988:1638: vajrajñānavaro yogo yeṣāṁ naiva hi vidyate|
